name: Chenyu Brew
title: Chenyu Brew
desc: Your initial sip brings forth flavor on an elegant light breeze, the sweet fragrances of Chenyu Vale alighting upon your lips and tongue. Hark â€” is that the sweet tinkling of the mountain springs singing in your ear?

skills.desc:
Choose one of your characters. The next 2 times you Adventure, or during the End Phase, heal the target character for 1 HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)
